Those who had taken extreme views of certain texts of Scripture, refraining wholly from labor, and rejecting all who would not receive their ideas on this and other points pertaining to religious duty, charged me with conforming to the world. On the other hand, the nominal Adventists charged me with fanaticism, 
                                                                           89
and I was falsely represented as the leader of the fanaticism which I was laboring constantly to arrest.
